Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit, and line a 9x13 inch baking pan with parchment paper.

Cream together butter, sugar, and eggs in a mixing bowl until smooth. Add flour, baking powder, and milk gradually until fully incorporated. Spread the dough into a prepared baking dish with raised edges.
Crush the blueberries in a bowl with 1/2 cup sugar, then spread evenly over the crust.
Bake until the crust is lightly browned and the blueberry filling is bubbly and thickened, approximately 15 to 25 minutes.
I received this recipe from a kind Finnish woman during my time as a missionary in Finland. The original measurements were in metric units, and I have converted them to English measurements.
